nodes.text: CB-6B was an orange BB-series astromech droid who originated from Black Spire Outpost, a settlement on the Outer Rim planet of Batuu. CB-6B had a black sensor and served beside Resistance pilot Poe Dameron while his astromech droid, BB-8, was stationed elsewhere on a separate mission.
CB-6B was created for a Target-exclusive Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge Funko Pop! toy released August 30, 2020.
